mapper.select: SELECT a.dt AS month , NVL(SUM(b.pay_price), 0) AS monthly_sales, NVL(COUNT(b.pay_price), 0) AS monthly_sales_cnt FROM (SELECT TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY') || '-' || LPAD(LEVEL,2,'0') AS dt FROM dual CONNECT BY LEVEL <= 12) a, (SELECT TO_CHAR(order_date, 'YYYY-MM') AS month , pay_price FROM orders WHERE order_date BETWEEN TO_CHAR(TRUNC(SYSDATE,'YY')) AND TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY') || '-12-31') b WHERE a.dt = b.month(+) GROUP BY a.dt ORDER BY a.dt

SELECT TO_CHAR(sysdate, 'YYYY') AS year, SUM(monthly_sales) AS monthly_sales_total, SUM(monthly_sales_cnt) AS monthly_sales_cnt_total FROM (SELECT a.dt AS month , NVL(SUM(b.pay_price), 0) AS monthly_sales, NVL(COUNT(b.pay_price), 0) AS monthly_sales_cnt FROM (SELECT TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY') || '-' || LPAD(LEVEL,2,'0') AS dt FROM dual CONNECT BY LEVEL <= 12) a, (SELECT TO_CHAR(order_date, 'YYYY-MM') AS month , pay_price FROM orders WHERE order_date BETWEEN TO_CHAR(TRUNC(SYSDATE,'YY')) AND TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY') || '-12-31') b WHERE a.dt = b.month(+) GROUP BY a.dt)
